# Strenthening equitable and inclusive tools for epidemic preparedness

The [WHO]() and regional organisations are supporting the development and use of analytics tools for epidemics preparedness and response. Powered by [Data.org](), the [Epiverse-TRACE]() project has made a substantial progress towards producing analytics tools aimed at addressing the most critical questions during an epidemics.
